tweaks.name: Accelerate menu reveal
tweaks.summary: Reduce the pop-up menu show delay for faster navigation.

tweaks.name: Disable window animations
tweaks.summary: Turns off non-essential animations to sharpen responsiveness on slower devices.

tweaks.name: Optimize visual effects
tweaks.summary: Writes Desktop Window Manager flags for a balanced performance profile.

tweaks.name: Tidy prefetching
tweaks.summary: Tunes prefetch behaviours to match SSD recommendations.

tweaks.name: Limit diagnostics
tweaks.summary: Restricts telemetry uploads to the minimum supported level.

tweaks.name: Disable Cortana background
tweaks.summary: Turns off Cortana background components while keeping search operational.

tweaks.name: Trim network latency
tweaks.summary: Applies stack tuning for quicker TCP acknowledgements on wired networks.

tweaks.name: Stop SysMain service
tweaks.summary: Converts SysMain to manual start for systems with fast solid-state storage.

tweaks.name: Silence low disk warnings
tweaks.summary: Disables repeating low disk notifications while keeping storage sense intact.

tweaks.name: Prevent surprise restarts
tweaks.summary: Blocks auto-restart after updates when a user is logged on.

tweaks.name: Auto-close hung apps
tweaks.summary: Ends non-responsive apps automatically on shutdown.

tweaks.name: Shorten hung app timeout
tweaks.summary: Tweaks wait-to-kill timeout for faster shutdown while staying safe for services.

tweaks.name: Respect lock shortcut
tweaks.summary: Ensures workstation lock hotkeys remain enabled across policies.

tweaks.name: Disable startup delay
tweaks.summary: Runs startup apps immediately after signing in by removing the safety pause.

tweaks.name: Show seconds on clock
tweaks.summary: Adds the seconds readout back to the taskbar clock.

tweaks.name: Last active taskbar click
tweaks.summary: Clicking a grouped icon focuses the most recently used window for that app.

tweaks.name: Speed up folder browsing
tweaks.summary: Prevents Explorer from re-sniffing every folder for content type to keep navigation instant.

tweaks.name: Disable power throttling
tweaks.summary: Stops Windows from limiting background CPU usage on desktop rigs.

tweaks.name: Take ownership menu
tweaks.summary: Adds a right-click Take Ownership entry for files, folders, and drives.

tweaks.name: Verbose startup messages
tweaks.summary: Shows detailed boot and shutdown messages for easier troubleshooting.

tweaks.name: Prioritise foreground apps
tweaks.summary: Applies the 0x26 Win32 priority separation profile for foreground workloads.

tweaks.name: Disable CPU core parking
tweaks.summary: Keeps all logical cores awake to avoid micro-stutter when threads burst.

tweaks.name: Remove network throttling
tweaks.summary: Sets NetworkThrottlingIndex to 0xFFFFFFFF for the multimedia stack.

tweaks.name: Lower MMCSS reservation
tweaks.summary: Reduces the CPU slice reserved for background multimedia scheduling to 10%.

tweaks.name: Boost GPU scheduling
tweaks.summary: Pushes the Games MMCSS profile to Priority/GPU Priority 8 for lower latency.

tweaks.name: Faster keyboard polling
tweaks.summary: Sets PollStatusIterations to 1 for snappier PS/2 keyboard response.

tweaks.name: Disable USB selective suspend
tweaks.summary: Runs powercfg to keep USB devices awake and prevent random input drop-outs.

tweaks.name: Disable HPET usage
tweaks.summary: Applies the bcdedit flags commonly used to reduce input latency on modern CPUs.

tweaks.name: Show extensions and hidden files
tweaks.summary: Shows file extensions and hidden items to reduce spoofing risk and ease troubleshooting.

tweaks.name: Classic context menu (Win11)
tweaks.summary: Restores the classic right-click menu on Windows 11.

tweaks.name: Hide Start/lock screen promos
tweaks.summary: Disables suggested apps and promotional content in Start and lock screen.

tweaks.name: Disable web results in search
tweaks.summary: Keeps Start/Search queries local and turns off search highlights web content.

tweaks.name: Disable advertising ID
tweaks.summary: Turns off the per-user advertising identifier and related tracking toggles.

tweaks.name: Disable consumer experience
tweaks.summary: Blocks Spotlight/consumer content and suggested apps system-wide.

tweaks.name: Disable shared experiences
tweaks.summary: Turns off cross-device sharing and nearby features backed by CDP.

tweaks.name: Block driver updates via WU
tweaks.summary: Excludes drivers from Windows Update to avoid surprise device regressions.

tweaks.name: Disable Remote Assistance
tweaks.summary: Turns off unsolicited Remote Assistance invitations.

tweaks.name: Disable SMB1 client
tweaks.summary: Turns off the legacy SMB1 client stack when present.

tweaks.name: Ensure Game Mode
tweaks.summary: Keeps Game Mode enabled via policy for consistent scheduling behaviour.

tweaks.name: Hardware GPU scheduling
tweaks.summary: Toggles Hardware Accelerated GPU Scheduling (HwSchMode).

tweaks.name: Keep kernel in RAM
tweaks.summary: Sets DisablePagingExecutive=1 to avoid paging kernel code (best for 16GB+ RAM).

tweaks.name: Trim mouse queue size
tweaks.summary: Sets MouseDataQueueSize to tighten buffering for snappier cursor movement.

tweaks.name: Zero keyboard repeat delay
tweaks.summary: Sets KeyboardDelay to 0 for instant key repeat start.

tweaks.name: Games MMCSS scheduling
tweaks.summary: Sets Games MMCSS profile to High scheduling category with GPU Priority 8.

tweaks.name: Disable pointer acceleration
tweaks.summary: Turns off Enhance Pointer Precision for consistent mouse movement.

presets.name: Balanced defaults
presets.description: Conservative optimisations for everyday productivity with low risk.

presets.name: Performance boost
presets.description: Prioritises throughput and responsiveness on enthusiast desktops.

presets.name: Minimal changes
presets.description: Keeps Windows behaviour untouched while letting you flip toggles manually.

presets.name: Gaming & latency
presets.description: Targets input, network, and scheduler tweaks for competitive play.

presets.name: Creator workstation
presets.description: Keeps UI polish while trimming friction for editing and rendering rigs.

presets.name: Diagnostics & recovery
presets.description: Turns on visibility and tooling for troubleshooting sessions.
